page.title: 17Stowmarket Carnival.
page.content: Stowmarket has had a carnival for 25 years and so it celebrates its Silver Jubilee in 1985. Each year a different theme is used, a variety of activities takes place throughout Carnival Week including football,darts,crib matches,snooker, a fancy dress parade. Prizes for these are usually awarded on the Saturday after the highlight of the week, which is the procession of decorated floats through the town, led by the Carnival Queen. There is a Fun-Fair on the Recreation Ground, also numerous trade stands. The week starts with a swimming gala and ends with a firework display. The carnival draws people in from many local villages.
